title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NilProperties of some representative non-aqueous solvents, including liquid ammonia, dinitrogen tetroxide, sulfur dioxide, molten salts, room temperature ionic liquids, and supercritical fluids. Use of non-aqueous solvents in synthesis. Books: J.E. Huheey
